function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of grey literature in the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Language limitation to english","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through literature search and review of covid-19 related materials.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of access to healthcare","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poverty leading to increased vulnerability to contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak rural infrastructure exacerbating disease spread","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges related to employment and income of millions of people","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fear and anxiety due to economic shocks and recession","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of travel constraints and quarantine measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure to the virus among field workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Isolation and work environment concerns for remote workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of training in covid-19 signs and symptoms, social distancing, and hygiene practices.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective communication leading to lack of updates and information for furloughed employees.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced productivity and workforce shortages due to challenges faced during remote work, isolation, and lack of equipment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Preference for living in gated communities during pandemics may lead to increased concentration of individuals in a confined space, raising the risk of disease spread.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Encouragement of others to move to gated communities may lead to societal segregation and inequitable access to resources and amenities during pandemics.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on the gated community environment for safety during pandemics may lead to complacency in implementing broader public health measures.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in built environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sanitation and hygiene practices","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing the antiviral efficacy of surfacewise 2 in liquid form using astm e1052 standard test method.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using unvalidated research data to guide clinical practice.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in crowded or confined spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global shortages of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unemployment due to workplace closures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission in workplace settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ppe usage and availability","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of education and awareness on ipc measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assessment of workplace measures for preventing and controlling sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of mental health outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusion of sars-cov and mers-cov studies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of inexperienced researchers for screening","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Discrepancies in extracted data","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of bias in quality assessment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low quality of evidence in cross-sectional studies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or biased data in modelling studies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discrepancies in quality assessment resolved mutually between reviewers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of random-effects meta-analysis method without considering common effect size","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential risk of uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases due to community transmission rate during intervention period","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of publication bias leading to inaccurate assessment of intervention effectiveness","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of low-quality studies influencing meta-analysis results","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in study design and settings may affect generalizability of results and recommendations.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited number of participants in some studies may result in skewed or unreliable findings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inclusion of studies conducted before covid-19 vaccinations were available may limit the applicability of findings to the current environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete reporting of intervention follow-up time in longitudinal studies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low quality score of some studies, including cross-sectional studies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of assessment on the effectiveness of environmental adjustments in workplace covid-19 ipc measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of systematic testing and monitoring","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use of ppe and hygiene practices","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of contact tracing and quarantine measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variations in ppe use and efficacy testing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
